A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Squandered opportunity. Still enjoyable but you only get to make the 8th episode of Star Wars once so why fall for all the faults of the prequel trilogy — the misplaced cheesy humor\, the superfluous plots and characters just there for action — instead of really developing the great characters and storyline you have? Not as good that The Force Awakens or Rogue One. About at good as the Phantom Menace.
